QuestData.Title: To Darkhaven
QuestData.Description:
Across this bridge is the hamlet of Darkhaven. It is fortified by those loyal to Sire Denathrius. These pitiful rebels would not dare approach it.
However, getting to it may prove challenging. Here, I shall carry the anima, you make sure no one throws us back into the Endmire.
QuestData.RewardText: It may not look like it, but this rebellion is on its last leg. Those who stand against the Master are fools who will know a new form of pain and suffering.
